Conjugalia Praecepta Machine readable text Plutarch Gregorius N. Bernardakis&responsibility;&fund.NEH; &Perseus.publish;
Plutarch Moralia Gregorius N. Bernardakis
Leipzig Teubner 1888
1

div2.p:
meta\ to
 pa/trion qesmo/n, o(
 u(mi=n h( th=s *dh/mhtros i(e/reia suneirgnume/nois e)fh/rmosen, oi)=mai kai\ to
 lo/gon o(mou= sunefapto/menon u(mw=n kai\ sunumenaiou=nta xrh/simon a)/n ti poih=sai kai\ tw=| no/mw| prosw|do/n. e)n me
 ga toi=s mousikoi=s e(/na tw=n au)lhtikw=n no/mwn i(ppo/qoron e)ka/loun, me/los; ti toi=s : i(/ppois o(rmh=s e)pegertiko
 w(s e)/oiken e)ndido/nta pro\s ta\s o)xei/as: filosofi/a| de\ pollw=n lo/gwn kai\ kalw=n e)no/ntwn, ou)deno\s h(=tton a)/cios spoudh=s o( gamh/lio/s e)stin ou(=tos, w(=| kata/|dousa tou\s e)pi\ bi/ou koinwni/a| sunio/ntas ei)s tau)to\ pra/ous te pare/xei kai\ xeiroh/qeis a)llh/lois. w(=n ou)=n a)khko/ate polla/kis e)n filosofi/a| paratrefo/menoi kefa/laia sunta/cas e)/n tisin o(moio/thsi braxei/ais, w(s eu)mnhmo/neuta ma=llon ei)/h, koino
 a)mfote/rois pe/mpw dw=ron, eu)xo/menos th=| *)afrodi/th| ta\s *mou/sas parei=nai kai\ sunergei=n, w(s mh/te lu/ran tina\ mh/te kiqa/ran ma=llon au)tai=s h)\ th
 peri\ ga/mon kai\ oi)=kon e)mme/leian h(rmosme/nhn pare/xein
dia\ lo/gou kai\ a(rmoni/as: kai\ filosofi/as prosh=kon. kai\ ga oi( palaioi\ th=| *)afrodi/th| to
 *(ermh=n sugkaqi/drusan, w(s th=s peri\ to
 ga/mon h(donh=s ma/lista lo/gou deome/nhs, th/n te *peiqw\ kai\ ta\s *xa/ritas, i(/na
pei/qontes diapra/ttwntai par' a)llh/lwn a(\ bou/lontai, mh\ maxo/menoi mhde\ filoneikou=ntes.

o( *so/lwn e)ke/leue th\n nu/mfhn tw=| numfi/w| sugkatakli/nesqai mh/lou kudwni/ou katatragou=san ai)nitto/menos e)/oiken o(/ti dei= th\n a)po\ sto/matos kai\
fwnh=s xa/rin eu)a/rmoston ei)=nai prw=ton kai\ h(dei=an.

e)n *boiwti/a| th
 nu/mfhn katakalu/yantes a)sfaragwnia=| stefanou=sin e)kei/nh te ga h(\diston e)k traxuta/ths a)ka/nqhs karpo
 a)nadi/dwsin, h(/ te nu/mfh tw=| mh\ fugo/nti mhde\ dusxera/nanti th
 prw/thn xalepo/thta , kai\ a)hdi/an au)th=s h(/meron kai\ glukei=an pare/cei sumbi/wsin. oi( de\ ta\s prw/tas tw=n parqe/nwn diafora\s mh\ u(pomei/nantes ou)de
 a)polei/pousi tw=n dia\ to
 o)/mfaka th
 stafulh
 e(te/rois proi+eme/nwn. pollai\ de\ kai\ tw=n neoga/mwn dusxera/nasai dia\ ta\ prw=ta tou\s numfi/ous; o(/moion e)/paqon pa/qos toi=s th
 me
 plhgh
 th=s meli/tths u(pomei/nasi, to\ de\ khri/on proeme/nois.

e)n a)rxh=| ma/lista dei= ta\s diafora\s kai\ ta\s proskrou/seis fula/ttesqai tou\s gegamhko/tas, o(rw=ntas o(/ti kai\ ta\ sunarmosqe/nta tw=n skeuw=n kat' a)rxa\s me\n u(po\ th=s tuxou/shs r(a|di/ws diaspa=tai
profa/sews , xro/nw| de\ tw=n a(rmw=n su/mphcin labo/ntwn mo/lis u(po\ puro\s kai\ sidh/rou dialu/etai.

w(/sper to\ pu=r e)ca/ptetai me
 eu)xerw=s e)n a)xu/rois kai\ qrualli/di kai\ qrici\ lagw/|ais, sbe/nnutai
de\ ta/xion a)
 mh/ tinos: e(te/rou duname/nou ste/gein a(/ma kai\ tre/fein e)pila/bhtai, ou(	w to
 a)po\ sw/matos kai\ w(/ras o)cu
 e)/rwta tw=n neoga/mwn a)naflego/menon dei= mh\ diarkh= mhde\ be/baion nomi/zein, a)
 mh\ peri\ to\ h)=qos i(druqei\s kai\ tou= fronou=ntos a(ya/menos e)/myuxon la/bh| dia/qesin.

h( dia\ tw=n farma/kwn qh/ra taxu\ me
 ai(rei= kai\ lamba/nei r(a|di/ws to
 i)xqu/n, a)/brwton de\ poiei= kai\ fau=lon: ou(/tws ai( fi/ltra tina\ kai\ gohtei/as e)pitexnw/menai toi=s a)ndra/si kai\ xeirou/menai di' h(donh=s au)tou\s e)mplh/ktois kai\ a)noh/tois, kai\ diefqarme/nois sumbiou=sin. ou)de\ ga th
 *ki/rkhn w)/nhsan oi( katafarmakeuqe/ntes, ou)d' e)xrh/sato pro\s ou)de
 au)toi=s u(si\ kai\ o)/nois genome/nois, to
 d' *)odusse/a nou=n e)/xonta kai\ suno/nta froni/mws u(perhga/phsen.
ai( boulo/menai ma=llon a)noh/twn kratei=n a)ndrw=n h)\ froni/mwn a)kou/ein e)oi/kasi toi=s e)n o(dw=| boulome/nois ma=llon o(dhgei=n tuflou\s; h)\ toi=s gignw/skousin a)kolouqei=n kai\ ble/pousi.

th
 *pasifa/hn a)pistou=si boo\s e)rasqh=nai basilei= sunou=san, e)ni/as o(rw=sai tou\s me
 au)sthrou\s kai\ sw/fronas barunome/nas, toi=s d' e)c a)krasi/as kai\ filhdoni/as kekrame/nois w(/sper kusi
 h)\ tra/gois h(\dion sunou/sas.

oi( toi=s i(/ppois e)fa/llesqai di' a)sqe/neian h)\ malaki/an au)tou\s e)kei/nous o)kla/zein kai\ u(popi/ptein dida/skousin ou(/tws e)/nioi tw=n labo/ntwn eu)genei=s h)\ plousi/as gunai=kas ou)x e(autou\s poiou=si belti/ous a)ll' e)kei/nas perikolou/ousin , w(s ma=llon a)/rcontes tapeinw=n genome/nwn: dei= d' w(/sper i(/ppou to\ me/geqos fula/ttonta kai\ to\ a)ci/wma th=s gunaiko\s xrh=sqai tw=| xalinw=|

th
 selh/nhn, o(/tan a)posth=| tou= h(li/ou, perifanh=
kai\ lampra
 o(rw=men, a)fani/zetai de\ kai\ kru/ptetai plhsi/on genome/nh: th
 de\ sw/frona gunai=ka dei= tou)nanti/on o(ra=sqai ma/lista meta\ tou= a)ndro\s ou)=san, oi)kourei=n de\ kai\ kru/ptesqai mh\ paro/ntos

ou)k o)rqw=s *(hro/dotos ei)=pen o(/ti h( gunh\
a(/ma tw=| xitw=ni e)kdu/etai kai\ th\n ai)dw=: tou)nanti/on ga\r h( sw/frwn a)ntendu/etai th\n ai)dw=, kai\ tou= ma/lista filei=n tw=| ma/lista ai)dei=sqai sumbo/lw| xrw=ntai pro\s a)llh/lous.

w(/sper a)
 fqo/ggoi du/o su/mfwnoi lhfqw=si,
tou= barute/rou gi/gnetai to\ me/los, ou(/tw pa=sa pra=cis e)n oi)ki/a| swfronou/sh| pra/ttetai me
 u(p' a)mfote/rwn o(monoou/ntwn, e)pifai/nei de\ th
 tou= a)ndro\s h(gemoni/an kai\ proai/resin.

o( h(/lios to
 bore/an e)ni/khsen. o( ga a)/nqrwpos tou= me
 a)ne/mou biazome/nou to\ i(ma/tion a)fele/sqai kai\ lampro
 katapne/ontos ma=llon e)/sfigge kai\ sunei=xe th
 peribolh
 tou= d' h(li/ou meta\ to\
pneu=ma qermou= genome/nou qalpo/menos ei)=ta kaumatizo/menos kai\ to
 xitw=na tw=| i(mati/w| prosapedu/sato. tou=to 0 poiou=sin ai( plei=stai gunai=kes: a)fairoume/nois toi=s a)ndra/si bi/a| th
 trufh
 kai\ th
 polute/leian diama/xontai kai\ xalepai/nousin: a)
 pei/qwntai meta\ lo/gou, pra/ws a)poti/qentai kai\ metria/zousin.

o( *ka/twn e)ce/bale th=s boulh=s to
 filh/santa th
 e(autou= gunai=ka th=s qugatro\s parou/shs. tou=to me
 ou)=n i)/sws sfodro/teron ei) d' ai)sxro/n e)stin,
w(/sper e)sti/n, e(te/rwn paro/ntwn a)spa/zesqai kai\ filei=n kai\ periba/llein a)llh/lous, pw=s ou)k ai)/sxion e(te/rwn paro/ntwn loidorei=sqai kai\ diafe/resqai pro\s a)llh/lous, kai\ ta\s me
 e)nteu/ceis kai\ filofrosu/nas a)porrh/tous pro\s th
 gunai=ka poiei=sqai, nouqesi/a|
de\ kai\ me/myei kai\ parrhsi/a| xrh=sqai fanera=| kai\ a)napeptame/nh| ;

: w(/sper e)so/ptrou kateskeuasme/nou xrusw=| kai\ li/qois o)/felos ou)de/n e)stin, ei) mh\ dei/knusi th
 morfh
 o(moi/an, ou(/tws ou)de\ plousi/as gameth=s o)/nhsis,
ei) mh\ pare/xei to
 bi/on o(/moion tw=| a)ndri\ kai\ su/mfwnon to\ h)=qos. ei) xai/rontos me
 ei)ko/na skuqrwph
 a)podi/dwsi to\ e)/soptron, a)xqome/nou de\ kai\ skuqrwpa/zontas i(lara
 kai\ seshrui=an, h(marthme/non e)sti\ kai\ fau=lon. ou)kou=n kai\ gunh\ fau=los kai\ a)/kairos h( pai/zein me
 w(rmhme/nou kai\ filofronei=sqai tou= a)ndro\s e)skuqrwpakui=a, spouda/zontos de\ pai/zousa kai\ gelw=sa: to\ me
 ga a)hdi/as, to\ d'
o)ligwri/as. dei= de/, w(/sper oi( gewme/trai le/gousi ta\s
gramma\s kai\ ta\s e)pifanei/as ou) kinei=sqai kaq' e(auta\s a)lla\ sugkinei=sqai toi=s sw/masin, ou(/tw th
 gunai=ka mhde
 i)/dion pa/qos e)/xein, a)lla\ koinwnei=n tw=| a)ndri\ kai\ spoudh=s kai\ paidia=s kai\ sunnoi/as kai\ ge/lwtos.

oi( ta\s gunai=kas mh\ h(de/ws ble/pontes e)sqiou/sas met' au)tw=n dida/skousin e)mpi/plasqai mo/nas genome/nas. ou(/tws oi( mh\ suno/ntes i(larw=s tai=s gunaici\ mhde\ paidia=s koinwnou=ntes au)tai=s kai\ ge/lwtos i)di/as h(dona\s xwri\s au)tw=n zhtei=n dida/skousin.

: toi=s tw=n *persw=n basileu=sin ai( gnh/siai gunai=kes paraka/qhntai deipnou=si kai\ sunestiw=ntai: boulo/menoi de\ pai/zein kai\ mequ/skesqai tau/tas me
 a)pope/mpousi, ta\s de\ mousourgou\s kai\ pallaki/das kalou=sin, o)rqw=s tou=to\ g' au)to\ poiou=ntes, o(/ti to\ sunakolastai/nein kai\ paroinei=n ou) metadido/asi tai=s gametai=s. a)
 ou)=n i)diw/ths a)nh/r, a)krath\s de\ peri\ ta\s h(dona\s kai\ a)na/gwgos, e)cama/rth| ti pro\s e(tai/ran h)\ qerapaini/da, dei= th
 gameth
 mh\ a)ganaktei=n mhde\ xalepai/nein, logizome/nhn o(/ti paroini/as kai\ a)kolasi/as kai\ u(/brews ai)dou/menos au)th
 e(te/ra| metadi/dwsin.

oi( filo/mousoi tw=n basile/wn pollou\s mousikou\s poiou=sin, oi( filo/logoi logi/ous, oi( filaqlhtai\
gumnastikou/s. ou(/tws a)nh\r filosw/matos kallwpi/strian gunai=ka poiei=, filh/donos e(tairikh\n kai\ a)ko/laston, fila/gaqos kai\ filo/kalos sw/frona kai\ kosmi/an.

*la/kaina paidi/skh, punqanome/nou tino\s ei)
h)/dh a)ndri\ proselh/luqen ou)k e)/gwg' ei)=pen a)ll' e)moi\ e)kei=nos. ou(=tos o( tro/pos, oi)=mai, th=s oi)kodespoi/nhs, mh/te feu/gein mh/te dusxerai/nein ta\ toiau=ta tou= a)ndro\s a)rxome/nou mh/te au)th
 kata/rxesqai: to\
me
 ga e(tairiko
 kai\ i)tamo/n, to\ d' u(perh/fanon kai\ a)filo/storgon.

i)di/ous ou) dei= fi/lous kta=sqai th\n gunai=ka, koinoi=s de\ xrh=sqai toi=s tou= a)ndro/s: oi( de\ qeoi\ fi/loi prw=toi kai\ me/gistoi. dio\ kai\ qeou\s ou(\s o( a)nh\r nomi/zei se/besqai th=| gameth=| kai\ gignw/skein mo/nous prosh/kei, perie/rgois de\ qrhskei/ais kai\ ce/nais deisidaimoni/ais a)pokeklei=sqai th\n au)/leion, ou)deni\ ga\r qew=n i(era\ klepto/mena kai\ lanqa/nonta dra=tai kexarisme/nws u(po\ gunaiko/s.

o( *pla/twn fhsi
 eu)dai/mona kai\ makari/an ei)=nai po/lin, e)n to\ e)mo
 kai\ to\ ou)k e)mo
 h(\kista fqeggome/nwn a)kou/ousi dia\ to\ koinoi=s w(s e)/ni ma/lista xrh=sqai toi=s a)ci/ois spoudh=s tou\s poli/tas, polu\ de\ ma=llon e)k ga/mou dei= th
 toiau/thn fwnh
 a)nh|rh=sqai. plh
 w(/sper oi( i)atroi\ le/gousi ta\s tw=n eu)wnu/mwn plhga\s th
 ai)/sqhsin e)n toi=s decioi=s a)nafe/rein, ou(/tw th
 gunai=ka toi=s tou= a)ndro\s sumpaqei=n kalo
 kai\ to
 a)/ndra toi=s th=s gunaiko/s, i(/n' w(/sper oi( desmoi\ kata\ th
 e)pa/llacin i)sxu
 di' a)llh/lwn lamba/nousin, ou(/tws e(kate/rou th
 eu)/noian a)nti/strofon a)podido/ntos h( koinwni/a sw/|zhtai di' a)mfoi=n. kai\ ga h( fu/sis mi/gnusi dia\ tw=n
swma/twn tw=n h(ma=s, i(/n' e)c e(kate/rwn me/ros labou=sa kai\ sugxe/asa koino
 a)mfote/rois a)podw=| to\ gennw/menon, w(/ste mhde/teron diori/sai mhde\ diakri=nai to\ i)/dion h)\ to\ a)llo/trion. toiau/th toi/nun kai\ xrhma/twn koinwni/a prosh/kei ma/lista toi=s gamou=sin ei)s mi/an ou)si/an pa/nta kataxeame/nois kai\ a)nami/casi mh\ to\ me/ros i)/dion kai\ to\ me/ros a)llo/triou a)lla\ pa=n i)/dion h(gei=sqai kai\ mhde
 a)llo/trion. w(/sper ga to\ kra=ma kai/toi u(/datos mete/xon plei/onos oi)=non kalou=men,
ou(/tw th
 ou)si/an dei= kai\ to
 oi)=kon tou= a)ndro\s le/gesqai, ka)
 h( gunh\ plei/ona sumba/llhtai.

*filo/ploutos h( *(ele/nh, filh/donos o( *pa/ris: fro/nimos o( *)odusseu/s, sw/frwn h( *phnelo/ph. dia\ tou=to maka/rios ga/mos o( tou/twn kai\ zhlwto/s, o(
d' e)kei/nwn *)ilia/da kakw=n *(/ellhsi kai\ barba/rois e)poi/hsen.

o( *(rwmai=os u(po\ tw=n fi/lwn nouqetou/menos o(/ti sw/frona gunai=ka kai\ plousi/an kai\ w(rai/an a)pepe/myato, to
 ka/ltion au)toi=s protei/nas; kai\ ga
ou(=tos e)/fh kalo\s i)dei=n kai\ kaino/s, a)ll' ou)dei\s oi)=den o(/pou me qli/bei. dei= toi/nun mh\ proiki\ mhde\ ge/nei mhde\ ka/llei th
 gunai=ka pisteu/ein, a)ll' e)n oi(=s a(/ptetai ma/lista tou= a)ndro/s, o(mili/a| te kai\ h)/qei kai\ sumperifora=|, tau=ta mh\ sklhra\ mhd' a)niw=nta
kaq' h(me/ran a)ll' eu)a/rmosta kai\ a)/lupa kai\ prosfilh= pare/xein. w(/sper ga oi( i)atroi\ tou\s e)c ai)tiw=n a)dh/lwn kai\ kata\ mikro
 sullegome/nwn gennwme/nous
puretou\s ma=llon dedoi/kasin h)\ tou\s e)mfanei=s kai\ mega/las profa/seis e)/xontas, ou(/tw ta\ lanqa/nonta tou\s pollou\s mikra\ kai\ sunexh= kai\ kaqhmerina\ proskrou/mata gunaiko\s kai\ a)ndro\s ma=llon dii/sthsi kai\ lumai/netai th
 sumbi/wsin.

o( basileu\s *fi/lippos h)/ra *qessalh=s gunaiko\s ai)ti/an e)xou/shs katafarmakeu/ein au)to/n. e)spou/dasen ou)=n h( *)olumpia\s labei=n th
 a)/nqrwpon u(poxei/rion. w(s d' ei)s o)/yin e)lqou=sa to\ t' ei)=dos eu)preph\s e)fa/nh kai\ diele/xqh pro\s au)th
 ou)k a)gennw=s ou)d' a)sune/tws,
xaire/twsan ei)=pen h( *)olumpia/s ai( diabolai/ su\ ga e)n seauth=| ta\ fa/rmaka e)/xeis. a)/maxon ou)=n ti gi/gnetai pra=gma gameth\ gunh\ kai\ no/mimos, a)
 e)n au(th=| pa/nta qeme/nh, kai\ proi=ka kai\ ge/nos kai\ fa/rmaka kai\ to
 kesto
 au)to/n, h)/qei kai\ a)reth=| katerga/shtai th
 eu)/noian.

pa/lin h( *)olumpia/s, au)likou= tinos neani/skou gh/mantos eu)preph= gunai=ka kakw=s a)kou/ousan, ou(=tos ei)=pen ou)k e)/xei logismo/n: ou) ga\r a)\n toi=s o)fqalmoi=s e)/ghme dei= de\ mh\ toi=s o)/mmasi gamei=n de\ toi=s daktu/lois, w(/sper e)/nioi yhfi/santes po/sa fe/rousan lamba/nousin, ou) kri/nantes pw=s sumbiwsome/nhn.

o( *swkra/ths e)ke/leue tw=n e)soptrizome/nwn neani/skwn tou\s me
 ai)sxrou\s e)panorqou=sqai th=| a)reth=|, tou\s de\ kalou\s mh\ kataisxu/nein th=| kaki/a| to\ ei)=dos. kalo
 ou)=n kai\ th
 oi)kode/spoinan, o(/tan e)n tai=s xersi
 e)/xh| to\ e)/soptron, au)th
 e)n e(auth=| dialalei=n, th
 me
 ai)sxra
 ti/ ou)=n, a)
 mh\ sw/frwn
ge/nwmai; th
 de\ kalh
 ti/ ou)=n, a)
 kai\ sw/frwn ge/nwmai;' th=| ga ai)sxra=| semno/teron ei) filei=tai dia\ to\ h)=qos h)\ to\ ka/llos.

tai=s *lusa/ndrou qugatra/sin o( tu/rannos o( *sikeliko\s i(ma/tia kai\ plo/kia tw=n polutelw=n e)/pemyen o( de\ *lu/sandros ou)k e)/laben ei)pw/n tau=ta ta\ ko/smia kataisxunei= mou ma=llon h)\ kosmh/sei ta\s qugate/ras. pro/teros de\ *lusa/ndrou *sofoklh=s tou=t' ei)=pen
ou) ko/smos, ou)/k, w)= tlh=mon, a)ll' a)kosmi/a
fai/noit' a)\n ei)=nai sw=n te margo/ths frenw=n
ko/smos ga/r e)stin, w(s e)/lege *kra/ths, to\ kosmou=n kosmei= de\ to\ kosmiwte/ran th\n gunai=ka poiou=n. poiei= de\ toiau/thn ou)/te xruso\s ou)/te sma/ragdos ou)/te ko/kkos, a)ll' o(/sa semno/thtos eu)taci/as ai)dou=s e)/mfasin periti/qhsin.

oi( th=| gamhli/a| qu/ontes *(/hra| th
 xolh
 ou) sugkaqagi/zousi toi=s a)/llois i(eroi=s, a)ll' e)celo/ntes e)/rriyan para\ to
 bwmo/n, ai)nittome/nou tou= nomoqe/tou
to\ mhde/pote dei=n xolh
 mhd' o)rgh
 ga/mw| parei=nai. dei= ga ei)=nai th=s oi)kodespoi/nhs w(/sper oi)/nou to\ au)sthro
 w)fe/limon kai\ h(du/, mh\ pikro
 w(/sper a)lo/hs mhde\ farmakw=des

o( *pla/twn tw=| *cenokra/tei barute/rw| to\ h)=qos o)/nti ta)/lla de\ kalw=| ka)gaqw=| parekeleu/eto qu/ein tai=s *xa/risin. oi)=mai dh\ kai\ th=| sw/froni ma/lista dei=n pro\s to
 a)/ndra xari/twn, i(/n', w(s e)/lege
*mhtro/dwros, h(de/ws sunoikh=| kai\ mh\ o)rgizome/nh o(/ti swfronei= dei= ga mh/te th
 eu)telh= kaqario/thtos a)melei=n mh/te th
 fi/landron filofrosu/nhs poiei= ga h( xalepo/ths a)hdh= th

w(/sper h( r(upari/a th
 a)fe/leian,

h( foboume/nh gela/sai pro\s to
 a)/ndra kai\ pai=cai/ ti , mh\ fanh=| qrasei=a kai\ a)ko/lastos, ou)de
 diafe/rei th=s i(/na mh\ dokh=| muri/zesqai th

 mhd' a)leifome/nhs, kai\ i(/na mh\ fukou=sqai to\ pro/swpon

oi( plou/sioi kai\ oi( basilei=s timw=ntes tou\s filoso/fous au(tou/s te, kosmou=si ka)kei/nous, oi( de\ filo/sofoi tou\s plousi/ous qerapeu/ontes ou)k e)kei/nous poiou=sin e)ndo/cous a)ll' au(tou\s a)docote/rous. tou=to sumbai/nei kai\ peri\ ta\s gunai=kas. u(pota/ttousai me

ai)sxu/nesqai tou\s ne/ous, i(/na ka)kei=noi pro\s au)tou\s ai)dhmo/nws e)/xwsin: o(/pou ga a)naisxuntou=si ge/rontes, ou)demi/an ai)dw= toi=s ne/ois ou)d' eu)la/beian e)ggi/gnesqai. tou/tou dei= memnhme/non to

ou)x h(=tton semno

koinwnw=si paidei/as: toi=s a)ndra/sin, au)tai\ kaq' au(ta\s a)/topa polla\ kai\ fau=la bouleu/mata kai\ pa/qh kuou=si. su\ d' w)= *eu)rudi/kh ma/lista peirw= toi=s tw=n sofw=n kai\ a)gaqw=n a)pofqe/gmasin o(milei=n kai\ dia\ sto/matos a)ei\ ta\s fwna\s e)/xein e)kei/nas w(=n kai\ parqe/nos ou)=sa par' h(mi=n a)nela/mbanes, o(/pws eu)frai/nh|s me

ou)k e)/stin ou)de\ periqe/sqai mh\ pollou= priame/nhn, ta\ de\ *qeanou=s ko/smia kai\ *kleobouli/nhs kai\ *gorgou=s th=s *lewni/dou gunaiko\s kai\ *timoklei/as th=s *qeage/nous a)delfh=s kai\ *klaudi/as th=s palaia=s, kai\ *kornhli/as th=s *skipi/wnos kai\ o(/sai e)ge/nonto qaumastai\ kai\ peribo/htoi, tau=ta d' e)/cesti perikeime/nhn proi=ka kai\ kosmoume/nhn au)toi=s e)ndo/cws a(/ma biou=n kai\ makari/ws. ei) ga h( *sapfw\ dia\ th

e)/setai: ou) ga pede/xeis r(o/dwn
tw=n e)k *pieri/as , pw=s ou)xi/ soi ma=llon e)ce/stai me/ga fronei=n e)f' e(auth=| kai\ lampro/n, a)
 mh\ tw=n r(o/dwn a)lla\ kai\ tw=n karpw=n mete/xh|s, w(=n ai( *mou=sai fe/rousi kai\ xari/zontai toi=s paidei/an kai\ filosofi/an qauma/zousin;
